audioText: Le mariage du milliardaire et de l'ancienne journaliste Lauren Sanchez doit se tenir dans la cité des Doges. Il aurait décidé de donner un million d'euros à une association de protection de la lagune, ainsi qu'à deux autres organisations locales, pour calmer les esprits.
question: Why is the billionaire giving money to local organizations?
options: To fund his wedding celebration in Venice
To support his fiancée's journalism career
To calm public opinion about the wedding location
To invest in lagoon tourism development
explanation: He gives money 'pour calmer les esprits' - to calm spirits/public opinion. The donations to the lagoon protection association and local organizations are meant to appease concerns about the high-profile wedding in Venice ('la cité des Doges').
